price: M’ayͻnkofoͻ mmienu a mene mo da afiase, anyame a emu apaepae gu sononko-sononko no na εyε anaa, anaasε Onyankopͻn baako, Opumpuni a Ɔkorͻn kata biribiara soͻ no?
arabic: يَٰصَٰحِبَيِ ٱلسِّجۡنِ ءَأَرۡبَابٞ مُّتَفَرِّقُونَ خَيۡرٌ أَمِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡوَٰحِدُ ٱلۡقَهَّارُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yāṣāḥibayi al-sij'ni a-arbābun mutafarriqūna khayrun ami al-lahu al-wāḥidu al-qahāru
